Spirit_Ward.help: You encompass an ally in a mystical Spirit Ward, which causes them to gain a small amount of damage absorption every few seconds for a short time. Recharge: Slow
Spirit_Ward.targetHelp: You encompass an ally in a mystical Spirit Ward, which causes them to gain a small amount of damage absorption every few seconds for a short time. Recharge: Long
Spirit_Ward.attackerHit: You envelop your ally in a Spirit Ward causing them to gain damage absorption over time.
Spirit_Ward.victimHit: {PlayerSource} envelops you in a Spirit Ward granting you damage absorption over time.

Arcane_Bolt.help: You channel arcane energies into a concentrated blast and release them upon your target dealing Moderate energy damage and possibly knocking them down. Recharge: Moderate

Mystic_Flight.help: Using powerful magic you are able to lift yourself from the ground and fly. While Mystic Flight is active you can use Translocation to teleport to a distant location.

Translocation.help: Clicking on this power and then selecting a location will cause the caster to vanish and reappear at their target location.

Enflame.help: This ritual allows you to imbue an ally or curse a foe with a fiery spell. If Enflame is cast on an ally or a foe they will leave a fiery trail behind them that will damage foes. Enflame requires you to have 2 other powers from the Sorcery power pool and be at least level 14. Recharge: Long
Enflame.targetHelp: You have been enflamed and will leave trails of fire behind you.

messages.attackerHit: You {PowerName} the ground, setting it ablaze!
You {PowerName} the ground, setting it ablaze!
You {PowerName} the ground, setting it ablaze!

Rune_of_Protection.help: You cast a Rune of Projection upon yourself granting you protection from Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Knockdown and Disorient effects as well as granting you a measure of damage resistance against all forms of damage for a short time. Rune of Protection requires you to have 2 other powers from the Sorcery power pool and be at least level 20. Recharge: Very Long
Rune_of_Protection.shortHelp: Self, +Res(All Dmg, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Knockdown, Disorient)
Rune_of_Protection.attackerHit: You are now shielded by a Rune of Protection!
